page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: At Johnson Matthey they do research into precious metals and minerals.They specialise in platinum and rhodium and use silver and gold as a by product. In one division they are experemting to reduce the lead fumes from car exhausts.There are 4 divisions-chemical and refining,metal printing and colour. 200 people work there with 80 students in the summer. They work a five day week on flexi time. There are 7 workshops and 3 buildings. On July 7 1985 they clebrated 10 years in Sonning Common. They use computers a great deal and have the most up to date technological equivalents. There are 54 divisions of Johnson Matthey all over the world.
